name: Nuvalis Campaign Trail
description:
You're a political candidate in the fantasy land of Nuvalis running for the Chief Crown Minister office.

Each settlement (village, city, or town) you travel to spawns a random event  and based on your answer, this changes the way the different demographics a settlement view you. 

You get a dozen turns aka settlements to visit and when your turn ends,  and at the end of your turns, it will be election day, telling the player if they won or lost.

Can you harvest enough votes from your chained travels?
